Package com.team22

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
com.team22.UserManager
public class UserManager extends Object
Handles creation, verification, listing, updating, and deletion of user accounts. Users are stored in a configurable CSV file (default: data/users.csv).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserManager()
    Constructs a UserManager with the default file path.
    UserManager(String userFile)
    Constructs a UserManager with a specified file path (useful for testing).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createUser()
    Creates a new user by prompting for username and role, then writing to the user file.
    void
    deleteUser()
    Deletes a user by prompting for a username and removing the corresponding entry.
    void
    listUsers()
    Lists all users from the CSV file.
    void
    manageUser()
    Updates an existing user's username and/or password.
    boolean
    verifyLogin(String role, Scanner scanner)
    Verifies login credentials based on username, password, and user role.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • UserManager

      public UserManager()
      Constructs a UserManager with the default file path.

    • UserManager

      public UserManager(String userFile)
      Constructs a UserManager with a specified file path (useful for testing).
      Parameters:
      userFile - the path to the user CSV file

  • Method Details

    • verifyLogin

      public boolean verifyLogin(String role, Scanner scanner)
      Verifies login credentials based on username, password, and user role.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to verify (e.g., Scientist, Admin)
      scanner - a Scanner for reading user input
      Returns:
      true if credentials are valid; false otherwise

    • createUser

      public void createUser()
      Creates a new user by prompting for username and role, then writing to the user file.

    • listUsers

      public void listUsers()
      Lists all users from the CSV file.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser()
      Deletes a user by prompting for a username and removing the corresponding entry.

    • manageUser

      public void manageUser()
      Updates an existing user's username and/or password. Prompts for the target user and new values.
